thread.title: No info on kissing scene with Emran: Payel Sarkar
thread.title_full: No info on kissing scene with Emran: Payel Sarkar

author: NewsWire
title: No info on kissing scene with Emran: Payel Sarkar
text: 0 0 0 0 0 Kolkata, Oct 12 (IANS) Bengali actress Payel Sarkar who will share screenspace with Bollywood actor Emran Hashmi in Bishnu Dutta’s “Gawah, The Witness”, on Monday dodged speculations on doing kissing scenes with the actor. “I have no information on that (kiss scene)… there is no point in speculation at this point . Let’s see what happens,” Sarkar told a TV channel here. The Bengali beauty will be seen in “Guddu Ki Gun” opposite Kunal Kemmu and would also essay the role of Nawazuddin Siddiqui’s wife in “Gawah”. In the film, she also has scenes with Emran. “I am really excited. Nawazuddin is a big name and I am happy to be working with him,” she said. Related Posts
